title: Spa Island's Location Near Sabaody Is Intentional
theory: Some fans theorize that the placement of the Spa Island filler arc immediately before Sabaody Archipelago was intentional to provide a 'calm before the storm' narrative breather. The lighthearted vacation setting contrasts sharply with the intense and world-changing events that occur at Sabaody, making the transition more impactful.
evidencePoints: The Spa Island Arc is positioned immediately after Thriller Bark and before Sabaody
The vacation theme provides emotional relief after the intense Thriller Bark arc
The arc's lighthearted tone creates maximum contrast with Sabaody's darkness

title: Foxy Returns Were Deliberately Placed to Test Audience Patience
theory: Some fans joke that the repeated returns of Foxy in filler arcs were a deliberate test by Toei Animation to see how much audiences would tolerate a divisive character. His appearance in Spa Island Arc, coming after his already-controversial Long Ring Long Land and Foxy's Return arcs, reinforced his status as One Piece's most polarizing recurring antagonist.
evidencePoints: Foxy appears in multiple filler arcs despite being unpopular with many fans
The Spa Island Arc brings him back shortly after Foxy's Return Arc
Episode ratings for Foxy episodes tend to be lower than average
